website_summaries.verdict: Choose between three cooking surfaces with this fine-tuned yet versatile raclette.
pros: Has three cooking surfaces to choose from -- a reversible aluminum grill plate with flat/ridged sides and a granite grill stone
Features adjustable heat controls with a maximum temperature of 375 °F
Plates heat up quickly and evenly
Comes with 8 raclette pans with heat-resistant handles
cons: Additional cooking surfaces and parts increase cleaning time

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Useless. I bought this back in May and was waiting for the perfect occasion to invite my friends over. I set up this beautiful table only to embarrass myself because the thing did not heat up enough To cook anything. Thank God I had my barbecue so I took all the meats and I threw it on the grill. This machine was useless and I’m so disappointed because it’s been so long since I bought it and I’m sure I can I get my money back. Waste of money. I have used our raclette machine before, and I know how it supposed to work. This thing did not warm up enough not even to cook One side of the meat.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Grill was great, worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall: 4.5/5, would buy again. Pros: - The whole system is easy to clean. - The variable heating is pretty neat; I think it's worth the extra cost. - Wood finish isn't real, but it looks nice. Cons: - The cord is a little short. Raclette is best served at the table, and you'd have a hard time connecting the grill to a wall outlet without an extension cord. Having said that, I think most other brands have the same issue - The stone took a little while to heat up, like other reviews have mentioned, but that's to be expected. I haven't tried the aluminum cooktop, but I imagine it's faster
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have product, so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It is a lot of fun to have guests over for dinner, sitting around the table cooking and talking, It's a must have for those who enjoy entertaining and eating! To add to the fun, I strongly suggest getting the lava stones and the salt blocks. We cooked the veggies on the grill, and put beef,chicken and tuna on lava stones and tuna(tartar)and chopped beef (beef tartar) on the salt blocks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cardillo

customer_reviews.title: Love our family Raclette grill time!
customer_reviews.text: Started this family tradition while living in France. So happy to continue it, thanks to the outstanding quality of this raclette grill.
customer_reviews.author: TamV.

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of my new Raclette with the wood grain base and the handles on the coupelles. Aside from the beauty, it cooks extremely well, it is versatile having the grill and the stone (which is also beautiful) and very easy to clean. My clients from Germany introduced me to the art of the Raclette but this one outshines what they brought from their home.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Z.

customer_reviews.title: Broken but I'm happy anyway
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a fine product, lots of fun if it works. No way to contact the seller though. Artestia doesn't seem to worried about their product meeting expectation. I am very upset right now because that was my whole Valentines Day dinner and when I went to set it all up the grill was broken. So disappointing, but I wanted to give them a chance to make things right. Which they did, I am happy to say that once I was able to contact them directly they did everything they could to fix the issue. 4 stars because it came broken but I changed it from one because things happen, and they made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very good Raclette grill for the buck
customer_reviews.text: A very well made Raclette grill. The granite top is polished and was much easier clean than I thought it was when looking at it after a long Raclette evening. Haven't tried the reversable top yet and probably never will. The stone ist just my preferred cook top for meat and veggies. Very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it for its versatility and price.
customer_reviews.author: Dieter A.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My dad bought this for me. He was visiting friends and they had one. I was not so sure about it but once it arrived we set it up and made some simple snacks we decided it was fun and great for a party. It is very nice quality for the price. I would give another as a gift for friends who enjoy entertaining. Recipes are hard to find. On line is better than any of the cookbooks offered.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same machine I used in Switzerland. I absolutely love it. My Raclette was delicious. I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, once its fully heated up
customer_reviews.text: The product is ready out of the box, just choose the cooking surface you want. We went with the stone, which takes some time to warm up, but once ready, does a good job of searing and cooking. The heating element also does a great job of melting cheese below the main surface. Only negative I would say is that there are a lot of parts to clean and storing of the product is a problem, as the box it comes in is pretty flimsy. Overall, I would recommend this as a fun way of entertaining guests.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this product. Everything is really light weight and mostly stamped out of thin sheet metal. The scrapers are made out of super thin plastic. Not sure how they wouldn’t melt with use. I’m not sure why given the price, but I was disappointed and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MN Hockey

customer_reviews.title: Center piece great for gatherings
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. Lots of fun during little parties. It is a talking piece that everyone gathers around. Outstanding customer service as well. I had a tiny problem and the customer service team resolved it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Gersh

customer_reviews.title: Raclette Party Grill lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: We have had a raclette party with our new grill and it worked great! It heated up well and did all that was promised. What a fun dinner party! The cheese melted nicely in the bottom pans while a variety of meat, salmon and veggies cooked on top. The clean-up was a breeze. We took the griddle off the top and it’s easy to clean surface washed right off in the sink. What a great way to entertain a 4-8 group of people. We talked,ate and enjoyed each other’s company. The electric cord needed an extension cord to reach the wall plug. The price was very reasonable. The grill would cost three times as much in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this Raclette! I was a little sceptical about the granit plate and if it would heat up well and it great! We cooked small pieces of chicken and shrimps on it in no time - you should let it preheat about 20 minutes. It is easy to clean and definitely worth the money. Healthy and fun food for family night or getting together with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Burger Nina

customer_reviews.title: will Not Buy or Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item 2 times first was defective and damaged during shipment, so we ordered a replacement second item arrived intact and we were looking forward to using it, had a dinner party and the grill stopped working in the middle and would not work again. So disappointed and so embarrassing in front of our guest. Sent the item back and the seller charged me $15 restocking fee. I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amrita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this at a Christmas & New Year family gathering & everyone really enjoyed it. I also used it for breakfast omelets, pizza & tortilla dinners for two, smores.... So much fun & having a variety of ingredient options is a plus. So far I have nothing negative to say about this Raclette or the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Great all around quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great ready-to-go dinner event with this raclette grill and hot stone. It was delivered on-time complete with 2 top options, trays and spatulas. It worked perfectly and is great quality. I appreciated the sellers success with one day delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & very functional raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: I gave as Christmas gift to my son and family. They've used it several times and really liked it. They had a raclette grill from when they lived in Switzerland but it was wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: nursN

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine, we had one in Europe before and used it every weekend. This one is very similar, easy to use and clean. As others pointed out, it needs to be on highest setting in order for the cheese and meat on top to cook at good speed, but we were 8 people and had no issues. Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Silden

customer_reviews.title: great for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: We've used it several times entertaining company. It's GREAT. The stone grill is a hassle to clean but otherwise it works wonderfully. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hering

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used this product with our kids last night. It works great and the kids had fun. One thing I would change is instead of plastic scrappera, maybe change to a metal so they dont melt so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Barthel

customer_reviews.title: Raclette is good
customer_reviews.text: We love raclette. My husband is from Germany, and I first had it there when we moved over the pond. We are back in the States now and around Christmas time my husband and I thought about raclette. This Raclette works well, and is functional. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: The granite cooking stone was delivered broken. Artestia's customer service was excellent and resolved the problem promptly and without hesitation. Worked perfectly for our family party!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: The best grill & customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love grill and even more the personal touch of the email from Jeff... Very good customer service... I work in customer service, do that says alot about the company 😊
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The first time I had raclette, I was living in France. I absolutely fell in love with it. So I wanted to let my family enjoy it as well. Everyone loved it. It heat up fine. Just plug it in before you are ready to eat to give it some time to warm up. We grilled skewers on top and melted cheese underneath and poured it over boiled potatoes. Such a fun meal :)
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: it was great! I bought it for my dad
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it! it was great! I bought it for my dad, he saw this while visiting Colombia and when he got back to the states he asked me to find him one. He brought it over still in the packaging. We made ribs and Guatemalan Sausage, both were delicious! Thank you! Cant wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: imminera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Already cooked some scallops, veggies and of course some cheese. It was all wonderful. Customer service from seller was amazing. Was very kind and prompt after a slight problem in shipping. He rectified it right away. I wish there were more people like that!
customer_reviews.author: dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great way to Entertain!
customer_reviews.text: We love using this raclette. It is our favorite way to entertain. I ordered one for our use and loved it so much that we ordered 3 more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Witt

customer_reviews.title: Looked good but did not heat very hot at all. Cheese bearly melted.
customer_reviews.text: Have wonderful parties with it. From steak tacos to breakfast foods. Pancakes, french toast are wonderful to make for 2 to a crowd. With warm fruit compote to syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Important to know that this product best accommodates 4 people as opposed to 8 as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Grill pork, chicken, steak and shrimp as well as a variety of vegetables as we shared this meal around the table with a couple of guests. So easy to use and to clean. Delightful addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JOG

customer_reviews.title: Love my raclette machine
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality! Hard to clean the stone side but I still love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophigabi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to enjoy with my family visiting us and we had a great time and food
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Take a little while to heat and not hot enough but does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very social and fun! Had no problem cooking chicken and shrimp for fajitas. Also toasted the cheese!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon King

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This Raclette is lots of fun to gather with friends. Enjoy cooking & sharing food as it comes off the Raclette, melt cheese, pour over anything on your plate and have a fun social time! Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: C~

customer_reviews.title: Heats well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas. We have done Raclette for Christmas for several years and now that she is out on her own I thought she should have one of her own.. I like this one much better than mine!
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: "Recieved the product quickly. Arrived in good condition. Awesome little cooker. Very fun cooking with the family and 7 year old daughter loves cooking her own food and learning. Also nice enough for romantic date night."
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent product. It could heat up a little faster. The cord is a little short. But cleaning it up after usage is easy. I used to spray some vegetable oil on the surface prior each use which makes cleaning up easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, overall fun experience
customer_reviews.text: Stone top not as useful as grill. Doesn't seem to cook veggies as well. Had first dinner party yesterday and guests really enjoyed experience. It does throw alot of heat though, a bit uncomfortable if using in a small setting
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: This product is as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This Raclette Grill arrived intact and in a timely manner. It is easy to use, heats quickly and I like the grill top options ( grill top, flat top and granite stone. It is very easy to clean. Have no complaints. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Cranor

customer_reviews.title: Love my Raclette
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy finding new recipes for my beautiful Raclette - cooks great and is a lot of fun with the family
customer_reviews.author: Christina Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties and even warming up leftovers!
customer_reviews.text: I have one and this purchase was for a Christmas gift! It is great for taco bars!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and he hosted a party with it. This is a great product! Heats up very fast and cooks well. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with ours that I ordered one for our son and family for Christmas! They love it too. Your booklet is very helpful but more info on the stone would be helpful and a few more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Light weight. Easy to clan. Heats well and fast. It does the raclete very well.
customer_reviews.author: marcos henrique castello branco blois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were stoked about this on Christmas! My partner loves raclette and this makes it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Dale

customer_reviews.title: that's a very good alternative to have fun with family and friends
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product and its quality. Maybe the spoons should be made with other material,, to avoid being burned when in contact with the raclette maker. One of them is already burned.
customer_reviews.author: Darcio Sayad Maia

customer_reviews.title: Gift for holidays
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for parties. It's a very social way to dine, you have to slow down and enjoy your meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to fondue
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loved this! It says up to 8 people can cook on it at a time. We found that its more like 4-5 people. We usually do a family fondue night but we enjoyed this even more
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: We had a fun party with 8 adults! Great for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Felten

customer_reviews.title: Love but damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the grill except when opened, the hot stone was cracked. Need to return for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of twins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Raclette...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Cooked everything to our liking. Great temperature control and it looks amazing! Very easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived with all the pieces. It works well and is easy to clean. Raclette is a fun & surprisingly easy meal.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love our Raclette - meals!
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Switzerland to the US and missed our Raclette-Dinner. Found this Raclette-Grill at Amazon and be happy. It works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyACH

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: There was no manual included, so I had to figure it out and guess how to prepare grill tops for cooking and how to clean properly.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect raclette machine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect raclette machine. Didn't have the opportunity to test the grill & stone options though as my main interest was for the raclette function.
customer_reviews.author: Fabien C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it works well with the items we have cooked on it (shrimp, cheese, vegetables, refried beans, tortillas, bread etc.). It's easy to clean and quite compact. I would recommend to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: vilmali lopez-mejias

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: well other than stone plate take while to heat up and center of it does not get hot as outer side due to heat pipes routing, it's ok
customer_reviews.author: Younghyeon Park

customer_reviews.title: After having the”kids” over for a family dinner with the ...
customer_reviews.text: After having the”kids” over for a family dinner with the raclette grill, now they both want to borrow it. May have to get a second grill.
customer_reviews.author: kurt f stahr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: The item is outstanding and it is very user friendly. I only wish I bought the bigger one. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mae F.

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it was easy to use. Enjoyed having family sit around and have an interactive dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Raclette Grill Performance
customer_reviews.text: Top plate gets hotter than the area where the cheeses are located. This leads to hot oil splashing onto the table.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Functional but...
customer_reviews.text: The voltage should be indicated clearly. I had to go accross the city to buy a pricy power converter to make it work. This made it a costly investment for something we used once. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume Huet

customer_reviews.title: It was the best! They enjoy it for great breakfast and dinner ...
customer_reviews.text: This was our Christmas present to our daughter and her husband, who have four children. It was the best! They enjoy it for great breakfast and dinner cozy family times 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: The Rackette is great, you can adjust temperature and the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rackette is great, you can adjust temperature and the quality of the product is what we were expecting!!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Murga

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Delivery as expected. Product as described for a reasonable price and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: great unit for fun and family
customer_reviews.text: brings a little home of Switzerland back on my American table.
customer_reviews.author: Mirko

customer_reviews.title: Easy and well-functioning temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Using the grill primarily for raclette. Easy and well-functioning temperature control. Easy clean-up. Love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! we just had our first friends over to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! we just had our first friends over to use this raclette and it worked beautifuly. Perfect size for our table.
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Raclette grill
customer_reviews.text: Wish there is a hole in grill to collect liquids from marinade meat
customer_reviews.author: Umars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Nash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent raclette machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine is great compare to price/quality. Easy to clean. Very nice combo.
customer_reviews.author: Khaean

customer_reviews.title: does not heat up like the previous grill I had
customer_reviews.text: does not heat up like the previous grill I had, so it took forever to grill meat and to have the pan's done!
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Raclette Grill and I cant wait to use it for a party.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I liked the grill and granite stone options
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. I liked the grill and granite stone options. I would have liked them to have included 8 spatulas for the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy and does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect grill for my dinner. The size wasn't too big or too small. I put the stone in the oven first to get it heated evenly, then added it to the grill. I don't think you even have to do that because it was extremely responsive to turning the temp up or down. Using the little pans was easy and they seemed to heat evenly. This is a great grill for the price with the added bonus of interchangeable tops! can't wait to try the other ones
customer_reviews.author: rachaelgood

customer_reviews.title: Company cooks their own.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this one evening with just the two of use to pre test and it was nice. The real test came last night as we had a part of eight. The downside was that those on the ends couldn’t reach but the atmosphere of everyone selecting their food and cooking their own WHILE visiting was really fun. Normally I would have spent the whole day prepping cooking and timing dinner to be ready for all on time. Over two days I prepared food to set out for everyone to choose from. No stress. Lots of laughter in between bites and cooking. Great fun but start with a smaller group first.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It does not heat enough to cook. We had the thermostat at maximum settings, the cheese would melt, forget about meats! 15 minutes later my first pieces if steak and chicken were still not cooked. Family party was ruined!! Yes we did preheat for 10 minutes and used a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Russell Simonet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th raclette grill and it it the best one I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Electric Raclette
customer_reviews.text: We use to have a cooking stone fired with gel pucks. This electric one makes it a lot easier to use. Tried both the stone and the non-stick griddle and we are pretty happy with it. The stone took about an hour to reach a decent cooking temperature, so plan ahead. Overall a great purchase for family and friends fun nights.
customer_reviews.author: Saker

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok this one showed up with a piece missing. You get what you pay for though. Even if we use this just a couple times outside, it will work fine. If my family likes it as much as I liked one similar from Germany, I'll go get the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Mstr Beekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed so it's a great item for any get together.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item. Amazon left package in a downpour and it was soaked, but the item withstood it all. I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: vivco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: My granite cooking stone arrived broken. I received a mail asking how my product was and when they heard about the problem they sent me a new granite plate. I'm very pleased with the product. It works great. So far I've used it for kebabs and pancakes and omelettes. I love the reversible plate too. Good stuff and much more affordable than at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for quick meals
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in great condition. We used it right away! I turned on the grill to allow the stone top to heat up while we prepared the veggies and meat. Took about 20 minutes to get everything sliced up which was enough time for the stone to heat up. Stone was hot enough to create a little sizzle. Cleanup was a breeze. Let the stone cool off completely and used warm water and a rag.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Smith

customer_reviews.title: eese to
customer_reviews.text: Tried once and very unhappy about the heating element being too far from the melting pans....had to elevate
customer_reviews.author: Andree Porchet

customer_reviews.title: Great for family get togethers
customer_reviews.text: Great way to enjoy time with friends and family that are over for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: The best you can wish for a family dinner.
customer_reviews.text: The best you can wish for a family dinner. Lots of fun, great taste. Nonstick coating
customer_reviews.author: IC-Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Love having this raclette for family, friends, and sometimes just my husband & me. Easy to clean, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: great unit
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to use, cleans up very nice and can be stored in original packaging
customer_reviews.author: onthe49thparallel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well. My suggestion is to preheat the stone plate in the oven before placing it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These table grills are awesome... I thought they were a bit bigger but nonetheless, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: RARoss

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this thing! What a fun way to enjoy dinner with everyone even the littles have fun making their own little creations of food!
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Effective and easy to clean! It tales a little long to heat up compared to the one I iwn in France so put it on 5-10 minutes before the meal.
customer_reviews.author: Sndrine_rchds

customer_reviews.title: like the cooking stone included
customer_reviews.text: I saw a Raclette grill being used and wanted one. After searching I decided on this one. I used it the first night I received it. It is compact but cooks a lot of food. I, especially, like the cooking stone included. All food cooked evenly. I was very impressed. I can't wait to have a Raclette Party. It's easy to use and easy to clean. And, between the cooking stone and grill, you can cook any way you like. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Max Redmon

product_meta.title: Artestia Electric Raclette Grill Tabletop BBQ,Two Large Non-stick Grilling Plates,Adjustable Temperature Control,8 Paddles,Clean Easy,Great Party(Full Size Stone/Reversible Metal Plates Raclette)
feature_bullets: Electric Raclette Grill with Two Top Plates (Cast Aluminum Reversible Grill Plate and High Density Granite Grill Stone) by Artestia, Serve the whole family. Model number AR-89001

The set includes one Reversible Cast Aluminum Grill Plate (18.3" X 9.2"), one High Density Granite Grill Stone (18.3" X 9.2"), eight raclette dish holders with heat resistant handles and eight spatulas; spare grill stone can be purchased at AR-89022 ( B078HSCL59 ); extra set of 8 melting pans at B07BV1YNDN; extra set of 8 spatulas at B01ABP8HB2; heat proof silicone trays for melting pans at B07C3LFWYW
It has adjustable heat control with light indicator, the plate can reach a maximum of 375 °F. Grill like professional chef!
The plates heat up quickly and evenly. You control exactly how the steak, seafood & vegetables is cooked right in front of you at your table to enjoy a healthy, tasty & flavorful meal
It uses North America Standard Electricity, 120 V, 60 Hz , max 1200 W, ETL Certified
